{"id":1297277186,"question_id":3461,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1719111579,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2884 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1297277186/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Minimum Area to Cover All Ones I","memory":"46.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def minimumArea(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        top, left, down, right = float(\"inf\"), float(\"inf\"), float(\"-inf\"), float(\"-inf\")\n        for r in range(len(grid)):\n            for c in range(len(grid[r])):\n                if grid[r][c] == 1:\n                    top = min(top, r)\n                    left = min(left, c)\n                    down = max(down, r)\n                    right = max(right, c)\n        \n        w = right-left+1\n        l = down-top+1\n        \n        return w * l","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-minimum-area-to-cover-all-ones-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
